rooms.name: living_kitchen_area
rooms.description: An open-plan living and kitchen area combining residential comfort with a modern design. Features integrated dining space.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: Favorable - aligns with southern or eastern exposure

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with attached bathroom for privacy and convenience. Designed to ensure proper ventilation and light.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: Favorable - placed in the north-west sector

rooms.name: home_office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with window for natural lighting. Provides quiet and minimal distractions.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: Neutral - ensure windows face east or north

rooms.name: courtyard
rooms.description: Central courtyard providing open air ventilation, greenery, and a communal area for relaxation. Incorporates water feature to enhance positive energy.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: Highly Favorable - acts as the central heart of the design

openings.description: Entry door ensuring smooth flow from exterior to interior, aligned with Vastu principles
Large windows in key areas to allow maximum natural light and ventilation
Door for external services ensuring separation from main living area
